```{r}
    delta_lqlt <- function(lambda, theta, eps = 0.001) {
      k <- length(lambda)
      ans <- rep(NA, k)
      for (i in 1:k) {
        d <- rep(0, k)
        d[i] <- eps
        ans[i] <- (log_q(lambda + d, theta) - log_q(lambda - d, theta)) / (2 * max(d))
      }
      return(ans)
    }

set.seed(123)
 delta_lqlt(lambda, theta[1,])
```
